comment.author: 64086917@N00
comment._content:
Peeling shrimps at home. 

A practice which is abondoned not that long ago. At the moment Dutch shrimps are peeled in Morocco. Too expensive to do it in the Netherlands.

comment.author: 79445422@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called La Belle Epoque ca.1890 - ca.1914 incl. ArtDeco and ArtNouveau, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 14673419@N00
comment._content: Also the peeling in Morocco is being gradually abandoned. Shrimps are now automatically peeled
